test.support.patch¶

test.support.patch(test_instance, object_to_patch, attr_name, new_value)¶

Override ‘object_to_patch’.’attr_name’ with ‘new_value’.

Also, add a cleanup procedure to ‘test_instance’ to restore ‘object_to_patch’ value for ‘attr_name’. The ‘attr_name’ should be a valid attribute for ‘object_to_patch’.
